<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7692</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="es">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="ga">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Claude Monet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Θλαuδε Monet</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will focus on testing their knowledge on the artist in a fun way.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos se centrarán en comprobar sus conocimientos sobre el artista de una forma divertida.</string>
            <string language="ga">Díreoidh daltaí ar a n-eolas faoin ealaíontóir a thástáil ar bhealach spóirtiúil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen konzentrieren auf die Prüfung ihres 
Wissens auf dem Künstler in einer Spaßmethode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles se concentreront sur tester leur 
connaissance sur l'artiste d'une voie d'amusement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas focalizarão em testar seu 
conhecimento no artista em uma maneira do divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille metteranno a fuoco sul verificare la 
loro conoscenza sull'artista in un modo di divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα εστιάσουν στη δοκιμή της γνώσης τους 
σχετικά με τον καλλιτέχνη με έναν τρόπο διασκέδασης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
